tha-ap335:0.3_0: and came forth with senior monks.
tha-ap335:1.3_0: seeing the flowers of the clouds,
tha-ap335:1.4_0: I recollected the Buddha of the Buddha.
tha-ap335:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap335:4.2_0: I alone became a dark disciple.
tha-ap335:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap335:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pajjota.
tha-ap335:7.1_0: and the third flowers of the seniors.
